items.sentence: I never seem to want to watch the same TV programs as Tom does.
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary wants to give the bottle of wine to.
Tom never told me why he wasn\'t here the day before yesterday.
Tom promised me that tonight he\'d sing that new song he wrote.
Please make yourself at home, and help yourself to some coffee.
Some people think the president spends too much time traveling.
That is one of the most difficult languages in the whole world.
The police think the burglar entered through a basement window.
The roads were very muddy since it had rained during the night.
Tom\'s wife doesn\'t like it when he smokes in the living room.
